text: Happiness... Is Not a Fish That You Can Catch is the third studio album by Canadian rock group Our Lady Peace. It was released on September 21, 1999. The producer of the album was Arnold Lanni. It peaked at #2 on the Canadian Albums Chart. == Singles from Happiness... Is Not a Fish That You Can Catch == *1999 - "One Man Army" *2000 - "Is Anybody Home?" *2000 - "Thief" Category:1999 albums Category:Our Lady Peace albums
title: Happiness... Is Not a Fish That You Can Catch
